titleStmt.title: Practical discourses on sickness & recovery in several sermons, as they were lately preached in a congregation in London / by Timothy Rogers, M.A. ; after his recovery from a sickness of near two years continuance.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Timothy, 1658-1728.
Woodford, Samuel, 1636-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ..., Jonathan Robinson ..., and John Dunton ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: Practical discourses of sickness and recovery.
"The Song of Hezekiah, paraphrased by Dr. Woodford": p. [2]-[5] at end.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams' Library.
